summary: An email from an unidentified sender to an FBI agent (initials MM) offering to provide updates on developments regarding Jeffrey Epstein and his associates. The sender expresses enthusiasm about sharing information and suggests a meeting in New York City.
keyFacts: An individual reached out to an FBI agent (MM) on April 1, 2019, offering to provide updates on Jeffrey Epstein and his associates.
The communication suggests the sender possesses information they consider 'wonderful updates' against 'Epstein & Co.'
The sender was in New York City at the time of writing and proposed a call or meeting to share information.
The document is an email, indicating ongoing informal communications about the Epstein case outside of formal proceedings.
The identities of the sender and the specific FBI agent are not fully disclosed in this excerpt.
